# cook your dish here
for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = [int(j)-1 for j in input().split()]
    d = dict()
    # st = tuple([0 for i in range(30)])
    st = 0
    d[st] = -1
    ans = 1
    for i in range(n):
     # st = list(st)
     st = st ^ (1 << l[i])
     # st[l[i]] = 1-st[l[i]]
     for j in range(30):
      # st1 = list(st)
      st1 = st
      st1 = st1 ^ (1<<j)
      # st1[j] = 1 - st1[j]
      if st1 in d and d[st1]!=i-1:
       ans = max(ans, i-d[st1])
       # print(i, d[tuple(st1)])
     if st not in d:
      d[st] = i

    print(ans//2)
